text: @JoeBiden HEY JOE, WE NEED TO SEE AND HEAR FROM YOU ON THE TV DAILY ABOUT WHAT'S GOING ON WITH THIS #BULLSHIT WITH REGARD TO THE COVID-19 VIRUS. THE AMERICAN PEOPLE NEED A STEADY AND STRONG VOICE TO STAND UP TO THIS WANNABE DICTATOR.
